item.title: Eternal Strands: How to Beat the Ark of Stricken Earth
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Ark of Stricken Earth Boss Guide in Eternal Strands
  • How to Get the Ensnaring Blast Power

Arks are imposing colossi that act as field bosses in Eternal Strands . They're some of the main enemies players will have to face in order to progress through the game, and the Ark of the Stricken Earth will be the first that Brynne fights in the game.

As an introductory boss fight, the Ark of Stricken Earth is one of the easier ones to beat. However, if you're at a loss about how to take this gigantic construct down, or if you're looking to get or upgrade the Ensnaring Blast power, here's a quick guide to help you out.

Ark of Stricken Earth Boss Guide in Eternal Strands

Beating at the Ark's toes until it dies won't work. Fighting giants in Eternal Strands is much like fighting large monsters in Dragon's Dogma or Shadow of the Colossus . To beat this boss, you need to strip away its armor and attack its weakspots .

The Ark of Stricken Earth's armor is held up by round buttons as shown in the image above. Climb the Ark, destroy all the buttons keeping a piece of armor in place, and once that armor piece falls off, start hitting the exposed weakspot. Each weakspot makes up a chunk of the Ark's health, and once that spot grays out, you'll have to repeat the process to a different body part until the Ark falls.

Use Ice Wall to pin the Ark's legs and make climbing easier. If it slams its fist to the ground, freeze it to make reaching its head and shoulders easier.

Tips

  • You can use your bow to shoot armor buttons and weakspots.
  • When an armor piece falls off, you can use your telekinesis powers to throw it at the Ark.

How to Get the Ensnaring Blast Power

Beating the Ark of the Stricken Earth for the first time will reward you with Ensnaring Blast , a Strand power that pulls in objects and entities in a target area before blasting them upward. It's a useful tool for both controlling crowds and clearing clutter.

Upgrading powers is an essential part of progression in Eternal Strands . You can further upgrade Ensnaring Blast by fighting the Ark of Stricken Earth again . This time, it'll come armed with a large staff, and it will use new attacks against you. However, it'll also be much easier to fight, as you can essentially execute it after a certain point.

Fight the Ark as usual and break off its chest armor . This should expose a glowing spot â€” make your way to that spot, and you'll get the option to Harvest it. Press the button that appears on your screen, and Brynn will siphon the magic from the Ark, killing it and upgrading Ensnaring Blast in the process. Harvesting magic from the glowing spot in the Ark's chest is essential to getting the Ensnaring Blast upgrade .

item.title: Pokemon GO: Mega Medicham Raid Guide | Counters and Weaknesses
item.description:
In Pokemon GO , new seasons tend to come into rotation every so many months as part of the live-service format in which the game tends to follow. With each new season that occurs, a new seasonal theme is introduced, which man influence the types of wild Pokemon, Egg hatch spawns, Raid bosses and in-game events are available to the player at any given time. Additional in-game celebrations and events may introduce additional Pokemon for a limited time, particularly with the like of certain Raid bosses such as Shadow Raids, 5-Star Raids, and Mega Raids.

Mega Raids are especially challenging in Pokemon GO , but they offer some of the best rewards. As well as Stardust, Rare Candies, EXP, and Berries, they're a way to get valuable Mega Energy. This can be used to evolve Medicham into its Mega Form once it's been caught. Given how difficult and important they are, it's important to be prepared for Mega Raids when they happen - so all relevant information to help players prepare, such as core weaknesses/resistances and the best counters, has been included in the guide below.

Mega Medicham Weaknesses & Resistances in Pokemon GO

In Pokemon GO , Mega Medicham is a Fighting and Psychic Dual-Type monster with a maximum CP of 2821 and a stat spread of 205 ATK, 179 DEF, and 155 STA . Due to this Type combination, Mega Medicham is resistant to monsters and moves of the Fighting and Rock Types, so players should avoid utilizing these attributes at all costs, so as to not put themselves at any disadvantage.

However, due to this unique Type combination, Mega Medicham is also weak to Pokemon or powerful moves of the Ghost, Fairy, and Flying Types. For this reason, Trainers should prioritize building a team of such specimens, as this will give them the best shot at taking down the raid boss. Lastly, through the Weather Boost mechanic, Mega Medicham gains an increase in power whilst battling under Windy or Cloudy weather conditions, so players may wish to avoid Raids in such locations if possible.

Best Mega Medicham Counters in Pokemon GO

In Pokemon GO , the best Mega Medicham counters include Pokemon that carry either a Type that the raid boss is weak to, and/or powerful moves of those same types. Players may also wish to consider STAB - Same Type Attack Bonus , which grants an extra boost in damage when a move matches the Type of the Pokemon who uses it. The best Mega Medicham counters have been identified below, but in the case that you do not have access to such specimens, you may simply use this list to build your own team of similar counters or suitable monsters.

Pokemon

Fast Move

Charged Move

Mega Rayquaza

Dawn Wings Necrozma

Psycho Cut

item.title: Overwatch 2: How to Get Synthwave Lifeweaver Skin For Free (Twitch Drops)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How to Get Lifeweaver Synthwave Skin For Free in Overwatch 2 Season 14
  • How To Link Battle.net Account To Twitch For Drops

Overwatch 2 has a roster of well-loved characters across three three in-game playable roles - Tank, DPS, and Support. A huge appeal to many of these characters is the unique Hero Galleries each one has, full of collectibles such as sprays, emotes, voice lines, highlight intros, and cosmetic skins that players can unlock and collect for each character in the game.

These character cosmetics can be earned through a variety of different methods, such as completing in-game challenges, participating in events, in free or premium Battle Pass tiers, purchasing on the Overwatch Shop, and from Twitch drops. With every new game season that comes and goes, there is usually one or more series of Twitch drops for players to collect along the way, with Season 14 including several Christmas skins, and more recently, the Synthwave skin for Support hero, Lifeweaver . Everything you'll need to know about how to obtain this skin for free during this time has been included in the guide below.

How to Get Lifeweaver Synthwave Skin For Free in Overwatch 2 Season 14

Overwatch 2 players can earn Lifeweaver's Synthwave skin for free during Season 14 until January 31 , when the drops will no longer be available to claim from Twitch. To earn this skin, plus a Synthwave spray, for free, players must first ensure their battle.net and Twitch accounts are linked, and then tune in to any Overwatch 2 stream that has drops enabledâ€”usually labeled with a [DROPS!] somewhere in the title.

After watching for a specific amount of time, players will be eligible for each reward, and can then navigate over to the Drops section of their Twitch account and click the claim button for each item. After doing so, you should automatically be able to locate and equip your rewards from Overwatch 2's Hero Gallery the next time you launch the game. However, it is important to note that in order to ensure you actually receive your items, you must push the claim button in Twitch before the end date of the drop duration.

All Lifeweaver Synthwave Drops For Overwatch 2

  • Watch for 2 hours : Synth Lotus Lifeweaver spray
  • Watch for 4 hours : Synthwave Lifeweaver Epic skin

How To Link Battle.net Account To Twitch For Drops

Before attempting to claim drops or accumulate view time, you should first ensure that your Battle.net and Twitch accounts are successfully linked together.

How To Link Twitch To Your Battle.net Account

  1. Open the Battle.net app.
  2. Click on your Gamertag, near your icon in the top right corner. This will open a drop-down menu.
  3. Select My Profile . This will open a new pop-up window.
  4. Navigate to the Links section, and click the edit button (shaped like a pencil icon). Now, click Add Link .
  5. Select Twitch. This will create a URL, so all you need to do is copy and paste your username to the end of it.
  6. Once complete, the link should look like: https://www.twitch.tv/YOURUSERNAMEHERE
  7. Click the Add Link button to confirm and save your changes.
  8. Your Twitch account should now be linked with your Battle.net and ready to receive drops!

item.title: Pokemon GO: Dialga Raid Guide | Counters, Weaknesses & More
item.description:
Pokemon GO utilizes a live-service format for the game, meaning that new seasons are introduced every so many months, each carrying a unique theme throughout its duration. Every season that comes and passes brings a new wave of Pokemon rotated in to wild spawns, Egg hatch spawns, and Raid Bosses, as well as a series of events that can add additional monsters as temporary encounters fro players to make the most of.

Players can battle Dialga as a 5-star Raid boss and get a chance to encounter Shiny Dialga. The legendary can warp, destroy, and create time itself, making it a powerful existence in Pokemon lore. Dialga possesses extremely powerful stats and an effective move pool in Pokemon GO , so winning against it as a Raid boss requires extensive type-knowledge and strategy, such as utilizing the best counters to overpower or target key weaknesses this monster holds.

Updated by Grace Black - January 27, 2025 : Dialga has returned to 5-Star Raids during Pokemon GO's Dual Destiny Season. For this reason, this Raid guide has been updated with all of the latest information - including weaknesses, resistances, and the best counters for taking the boss down.

Pokemon GO: Dialga Weaknesses And Resistances

Dialga is a legendary dual Steel and Dragon Dual-Type monster with amazing prowess in Pokemon GO . The monster has a maximum Combat Power of 4565 , which increases notably as a 5-star raid boss. The increased power level makes it extremely hard to win against, and players require proper counters to have a shot.

Dialga is a strong monster with a stat spread of 275 ATK, 211 DEF, and 205 STA, making it an extremely powerful presence in Pokemon GO PvP and PvE battles. In Pokemon GO, Dialga is resistant to Grass, Poison, Rock, Steel, Psychic, Flying, Normal, Water, Bug, and Electric Types - so Trainers should avoid using such monsters in battle against the Raid boss. Instead, players should prioritize utilizing powerful specimens or moves of the Ground or Fighting Types , as these are both Dialga's key weaknesses.

Pokemon GO: Best Dialga Raid Counters

Although Dialga experiences a power boost in Raids, players can still strategize to defeat it by studying the monsterâ€™s weaknesses and resistances to carefully strategize the right counters against it. One should select counters with moves that align with its weaknesses while activating the Same Type of Bonus Attack effect - STAB. STAB occurs when a Pokemon type and Pokemon GO Move type are identical, dealing bonus damage to the opponent.

Pokemon GO trainers should curate a strategized battle roster to win against Dialga in 5-star raids. Some of the best options for this matchup have been outlined below. However, in the case that you do not have access to such monsters, you may simply use this list as inspiration for building your own team of similar specimens or other suitable counters.

Pokemon

Fast Move

Charged Move

Primal Groudon

Mud Shot

Precipice Blades

Mega Garchomp

Mud Shot

Earth Power

Mega Lucario

Force Palm

Aura Sphere

Shadow Garchomp

Mud Shot)

Earth Power

Shadow Excadrill

Mud-Slap

Scorching Sands

Mega Heracross

Counter

Close Combat

Mega Blaziken

Counter

Focus Blast

Therian Forme Landorus

Mudshot

Sandsear Storm

Terrakion

Double Kick

Sacred Sword

After defeating the Pokemon GO raid boss, there is a possibility of Shiny Dialga spawning nearby. While the Shiny encounter isnâ€™t guaranteed, one can try matching its Shiny odds. Try to defeat numerous Dialga raids; this results in several Dialga spawns, which might help achieve its Shiny odds, and stumbling upon such a luckty encounter.

item.title: How to Carry More Resources in Eternal Strands
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Using Casmyn's Caravan in Eternal Strands
  • How to Carry More Resources in Eternal Strands

When you first go into your Inventory menu to see your collected resources in Eternal Strands , you'll notice that there are some locked slots. With only 12 slots open for unique materials (these are used for Salvaging/equipment upgrades), Brynn will eventually have to leave items behind on the ground if her backpack is full.

Of course, you can store items in your chest back at camp, but if you want to unlock those extra Resource slots in Eternal Strands , this is how it's done.

After scouting Glintwood Hollow for the first time as part of the Blazing A Trail quest (which includes the following objectives: Look for a second loomgate in Feller's Arch and Look for a Great Ark near the Collapsed Mine), you'll return to the home base.

Using Casmyn's Caravan in Eternal Strands

Speak to Casmyn at her Caravan, and she'll teach you all about salvaging resources for Camp Supplies . These can be used to upgrade the base's functions.

After getting said supplies, speak to Casmyn and use the Upgrade Station. As part of the main story, you'll have to use your first ten Camp Supplies to upgrade Sola's Forge. However, go back to Casmyn, and you'll finally get to upgrade (and unlock) the other stations, including Casmyn's Cavern .

How to Carry More Resources in Eternal Strands

To upgrade Casmyn's Caravan to level 2 and carry more stuff in Eternal Strands , you'll need to make 20 Camp Supplies with Casmyn .

For the level 2 upgrade, Brynn will have 15 slots available in her pack and the scry will be able to pull up to four resources to safety when Brynn "dies."

Players can progress through the story to unlock further advancements to all four of the upgrade stations. If you need more Camp Supplies, just go out into the wild and start exploring, defeating monsters, and breaking containers.
